abstract_ssm: The Rubin Ehrlich Papers mostly contain military materials and documents belonging to Rubin Ehrlich (1913-2001) , who served in the Lincoln Battalion during the Spanish Civil War.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
